prompt.content: You are an Amazon customer that likes to write reviews for products. You will be provided a set of features to help you understand your writing style. First feature you will receive is similar product-review pairs from your past reviews to remind you of your style: Product: Caffe D'Vita Sugar Free Mocha Instant Cappuccino, 8.5-Ounce Canisters (Pack of 6) Review: I finally found this in my local Smart & Final store where I got a big can for $5. I couldn't find it in any of my local supermarkets. I LOVE cappuccino, hot and iced, one of my guilty pleasures since I try hard to stay away from coffee but I can't turn away a good cup of cappuccino. The taste is great, NOT at all bitter, but the problem is it does NOT dissolve well at all in cold milk nor cold water. What I do is heat some water first just to the point of enough heat to dissolve the mix and then I'll put in the refrigerator for an hour or in the freezer for 15-30 minutes. Then i'll add the cold milk on top and it tastes wonderful!! Rating: 5.0 Product: Yogi Tea - Kava Stress Relief - Eases Tension and Promotes Relaxation - 6 Pack, 96 Tea Bags Total Review: I LOVE the fact that Yogi did NOT add any type of mint herb again which just makes it taste bitter and makes me think i'm drinking wrigley's mint chewing gum rather than a tasty mild herbal drink. I like the malted, carob creamy taste with pleasantly fragrant sarsparilla, cinnamon and ginger and hazelnut flavoring. I usually use rooibos tea for my anxiety to calm my nerves but when I saw this at my local Safeway and saw the ingredients, I knew I had to try it. It IS very calming such that I'm not so nervous or anxious and I can actually sleep well at night. The kava root in it helps me think more clearly and less anxiously. Usually, I use yerba mate for stress, but this tea does a great job helping me with stress as well as tastes much better than bitter yerba mate. I usually make an herbal concoction iced drink of rooibos Davidson's Organic Tea South African Rooibos, 100-Count Tea Bags (high # of teabags for the price) or Twinings Rooibos Organic, 20-Count Tea Bags (Pack of 6 ) (great taste for the price) and this tea, and Joint Flexor Herbal Tea to maintain my joints against arthritis, hawthorn Traditional Medicinals Heart Tea with Hawthorn, 16-Count Tea Bags, 1.13 oz, (Pack of 6) also to help stabilize against arthritis as well as help with my body's blood circulation, and bilberry herbs for better vision and lately, passionflower tea for a more relaxed mood, Tadin Tea, Pasiflora (Passion Flower) Tea, 24-Count Tea Bags (Pack of 12). I'll make a large quantity of this drink each morning, cool it in the refrigerator, maybe add organic raw honey Heavenly Organics Organic Wild Forest Raw Honey Unheated -- 12 oz when the tea cools (heat inactivates honey enzymes), and when I come home in the afternoon or night, I've got an instant healthy cold refreshing drink without needing to resort to unhealthy acidy oversugared soda or corn fructose drinks. The concoction has helped me resist serious sneezing allergies and I get less colds and they're less severe than usual as well as help me with my anxiety. However, because the kava kava is very strong and potent (and too much can toxify the liver), I only add it to my concoction a couple of times a week. Rooibos is a lot less strong and doesn't get my mind as cloudy as adding the kava kava. Note: if you have any loose herbs, muslin bags such as Cotton Muslin Bags 4x6 Inches 25 Count Pack are great to pack them in wihout having to deal with trying to remove loose herbs in your teas. Rating: 5.0 Product: Yogi Tea - Echinacea Immune Support - Supports Immune Function - 6 Pack, 96 Tea Bags Total Review: Usually I don't like strong herbal teas like Celestial Seasoning, but when I've got a cold, this tea hits the spot. It has a strong aromatic fragrance from the licorice and it tastes pretty sharp and stinging from the black pepper and ginger but that just tells me it's working well and working on my body to help soothe and heal it. I've given it to friends when they have colds and it's not a miracle cure tea but definitely a light healer for them in addition to their regular medicines. I usually add my favorite tea (rooibos) into it which seems to make it taste a lot better and make me less stressed, less anxious, more awakened, and more relaxed. I'll also add lemon and when it cools to lukewarm (heat kills the honey's enzymes), I'll add organic raw honey for even more healthful healing benefits. Rating: 4.0 Product: Ahmad Tea Blackcurrant Burst Black Tea, 20-Count Boxes (Pack of 6) Review: I have never tried Ahmad tea although I had heard Ahmad's brand quality was high and I was looking for a better blackcurrant tea ever since Twining's changed their blackcurrant tea formula into something with yucky flowery herbs. Well, I couldn't taste any herbs in Ahmad's blackcurrant tea. In fact, I couldn't taste/smell any blackcurrant at all. The tea leaves OVERPOWER whatever blackcurrant flavor is there. If you're looking for a blackcurrant tea, Ahmad's would not be a good choice. Rating: 3.0 Product: Yogi Tea - Peach DeTox - Healthy Warming Blend - 6 Pack, 96 Tea Bags Total Review: I bought this for my mom to help with her arthritis that she keeps complaining about and wouldn't you know that she did NOT want to take it. (She likes pure chinese green tea better.) So I decided to take it myself since I had spent the money for it. I HATE the spearmint & peppermint herbs (they remind me too much of the chewing gum and I wish yogi would take them out)-- Rooibos tea is my usual tea since it's sooo relaxing for my anxiety. As far as taste, a lemon or orange flavored tea are more to my liking. So I treated it like an iced tea and just got a large heat-proof container with a lid and into it using a large funnel, I combined: -1 bag of this tea with -1 bag of my Davidson's Organic Tea South African Rooibos, 100-Count Tea Bags and -1 bag of a NON-HERBAL TEA (I love Tazo teas and tried them with this joint comfort tea, but there are too many yucky herbs like hibiscus and spearmint in Tazo teas which adds to the already bitter herbs in the joint comfort herbs, so something non-herbal is best like in Bigelow teas) Bigelow Lemon Lift Tea, 20-Count Boxes (Pack of 6)(sometimes with a REAL lemon) (OR Bigelow Constant Comment Tea, 20-Count Boxes (Pack of 6) or Bigelow Raspberry Royale Tea, 20-Count Boxes (Pack of 6)) in boiling water and left them to steep and cool in the refrigerator in the morning and drank the cold tea in the afternoon/evenings and was able to tolerate it. (Sometimes I'll add Heavenly Organics Organic Wild Forest Raw Honey Unheated -- 12 oz to it when it has cooled down.) This tea CERTAINLY relieved MY joints. I usually have a hard time stretching but after a week of drinking this tea, I felt almost like an athlete as far as my joints were concerned. The yucca root extract, cat's claw bark extract (uncaria tomentosa alkaloids), and devil's claw root extract in it certainly help with relieving any joint pain. Also, I notice that I have fewer allergy sneeze/running nose attacks that I usually have and fewer colds. It's an excellent tea if you want to relieve your joints and a great value for your money especially with Subscribe & Save. Note: if you have any loose herbs, muslin bags such as Cotton Muslin Bags 4x6 Inches 25 Count Pack are great to pack them in without having to deal with trying to remove loose herbs in your teas and/or if you want to try different mixes of herbal bagged teas to get different medicinal effects or want to try different new herbs. The bags help to easily remove the herbs, even if bagged and you don't accidentally drink any of the herbs which can be pretty yucky tasting. Rating: 5.0 Product: The Republic of Tea Double Green Matcha, Gourmet Blend of Organic Green Tea And Matcha Powder (50 Tea Bags) Review: I love Republic of Tea's rooibos teas. I bought mine at Whole Foods. Republic of Tea's teas quality rival Numi's but I think this rooibos tea is even higher in quality than Numi's since you get "double" the dose of usual rooibos so that you get a deeper taste of rooibos and you can see and smell the red rooibos powder lightly dusted off the teabags. And the packaging is compact and attractive, great as a gift. What I like about rooibos is that it doesn't have that yucky tasting flowery herbal taste of hibiscus, rosehips, etc that teas like Celestial Seasoning are notoriously known for. Also, you don't have to feel like Superman trying to break into their teabags (like Numi's) since there are no enclosed individual protective packets around each tea bag. Rooibos teas are nutty and mellow in taste. Rooibos is healthy, great for skin ailments and calming for anxiety/nervous tension (which is why I love it so much), and it has no caffeine. I double my health with it by adding raw unprocessed honey but it's really already slightly sweetened so that you don't need a lot of sweetener. The tea is even better iced. If it weren't so expensive, I'd get it more often but am forced with the lower cost alternative with Twining's rooibos teas which has a more "hay" taste/smell. Rating: 5.0 Product: Numi Organic Tea Rooibos Chai, 18 Bags, Caffeine Free Herbal Teasan, Organic Rooibos Tea Blended with Chai Spices (Packaging May Vary), Premium Organic Non-Caffeinated Rooibos Chai Tisane, Red Tea Review: I was 1st introduced to Numi teas when I was drawn to the artistic, beautiful packaging of Numi's rooibos tea (the version with the artistic drawing of elephants in an african savannah) at Safeway supermarket as I needed a small food item but that had an expensive-look to serve as a "community" gift for everyday munching or drinking for coworkers at work for our small kitchen/computer/lunchroom at a prestigious company. After finding their rooibos tea so wonderfully tasting as well as relaxing to my nerves as I get anxious and nervous, rooibos tea has been my #1 breakfast tea to drink in the morning. Their rooibos is much milder than you find with the more affordable Twinings tea but rooibos tastes a little nutty and you don't need sugar since it has a very mildly sweet taste. I, however, will also add organic raw honey to it to give me the benefits not only of the herb but also the benefits of the organic unprocessed honey which makes it a complete healthful breakfast tea for me. There's a VERY TINY cut in the corner to indicate where to rip the teabag package but what I don't like about Numi teas is sometimes, the cut is not there and so that same small paper-plastic packaging that holds each tea bag is difficult to open OR when you rip it at the cut end, the rip still doesn't result in the opening of the tea bag pkg - it's protective with tough plastic on the inside and you NEED scissors or else you won't be able to open it unless you're Superman. But what i love about their teas is that, like another reviewer posted, they don't taste like the usual flowery herbs (like licorice, flowery herbs/roots/leaves, mint, hibiscus, rosehips, etc.) which is what i hate about Celestial Seasonings Tea and why i moved away from Twinings blackcurrant tea when they changed the formula. So you get the benefit of the herb in the tea without the yucky flowery herbal tastes/flavors. Rating: 5.0 Product: Surf Sweets Gummy Bears, Nut Free, Gluten Free, Dairy Free, 2.75 oz. (Pack of 12) Review: As another reviewer posted and the package states: "Organic fruit juice, Fortiied with Vitamin C, natural colors and flavors, free of Corn Syrup and GMO's, nut-free, and gluten-free" If you like Black Forest non-organic gummy bears (and I'm one of them), these would have to be almost indistinguishable from them - soft and slightly chewy but NOT incredibly chewy like haribo (which I hate) or yummyearth, but unlike yummyearth organic gummy bears whose sweetness you can taste just from the outside of the gummybear, surfsweet's tasty sweetness is buried in the gummy bear like Black Forest. It's 90% organic and "Certified Organic by Quality Assurance International." Ingredients, as exactly stated on the back of the package, are: "Organic Tapioca Syrup, Organic Evaporated Cane Juice, Gelatin, Organic Grape Juice Concentrate, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Ascorbic Acid, Colors Added (including Black Carrot Juice Concentrate, Turmeric, Annatto), Natural Flavors, Organic Sunflower Oil, Carnauba Wax." Of course, the packets of gummy bears are tiny with only ABOUT 10 gummy bears which total only 80 calories. You don't get many gummy bears per small packet. But then, they're ORGANIC, corn syrup-free, GMO-free, nut-free and gluten-free. Rating: 5.0 Product: Natural Nectar Natural ChocoDream, Belgian Cocoa Spread with Hazelnuts, 12.3-Ounce Glass Jars (Pack of 3) Review: Yeah, the pkg says the Cocoa is Fair Trade Certified and it's made in Belgium and it has no trans fat and nothing artificial but it's first ingredient on its list is sugar and it has palm and/or canola oil. It's not as sweet as candy as Nocciolata Organic Hazelnut Spread with Cocoa and Milk -- 9.52 oz but it is MUCH more sweet than Justin's Nut Butter Natural Chocolate Hazelnut Blend, 16 Ounce plastic jars (Pack of 3) so no, I wouldn't buy it again on a regular basis but maybe occasionally. It's incredibly smooth and chocolatey but it's on the sweet side. Sometimes, I may want its sweetness on my english muffin or hard shortbread-like cookie, but after tasting Justin's non-sweet, hardy nutella, it's hard for me to switch on a regular basis to a sweet nutella. Rating: 4.0 Product: Organic Dark Chocolate Peanut Butter Cups by Justin's, Rainforest Alliance Certified Cocoa, Gluten-free, Responsibly Sourced, 12 Packs of 2-Cups each Review: I bought mine at Whole Foods. If you've tasted Reese's, then you won't be disappointed. Usually when I buy organic, the taste isn't really that great, but Justin's was even better than Newman's (which is like almost liquidy dripping -not that tasty- peanut butter coming out of a melting chocolate shell.) Justin's is a firmer tasty peanut butter filling in a firm tasty chocolate shell. It's organic, vegan so a better alternative to Reese's but still tasty. Product: Annie's Gluten Free Rice Pasta & Cheddar Macaroni & Cheese, 12 Boxes, 6oz (Pack of 12) Review: versus making your own gluten free mac and cheese (or any mac and cheese for that matter). Great for quick dinners for the kids, or even as a side. I doctor it up by adding milk and butter ~ the same as you would for any other boxed mac and cheese. It's a keeper! Product: Teas' Tea Black Tea Latte 16.9 Ounce (Pack of 12) Organic Cane Sugar Sweetened Fat Free No Artificial Sweeteners Antioxidant Rich High in Vitamin C Caffeinated Rating: 5.0 Review:

golds.output: This trail mix is a perfect combination of flavors and textures, I love it. The cranberries are sweet and chewy, the almonds are crunchy, and the cashews are rich and nutty. I like that it's non-GMO and has no artificial ingredients, it's a great option for a healthy snack. The portion size is just right, 1 oz is perfect for on the go. The mix is not too sweet, it's just right. I highly recommend this trail mix, it's a great choice for anyone looking for a tasty and healthy snack.

prompt.content:
You are an Amazon customer that likes to write reviews for products. You will be provided a set of features to help you understand your writing style.
First feature you will receive is similar product-review pairs from your past reviews to remind you of your style:
<similarpairs>
Product:
Skinny Dipped Almonds, Dark Chocolate Almonds Raspberry, 1.5oz, 7g plant based protein, Non GMO project verified, gluten free, 9g sugar, 230 calories (pack of 10)
Review:
This is nice change for eating a nut snack. These are packaged in individual serving bags for portion control and easy portability.  The almonds are coated in chocolate and then they have a dusting of red powder on them that taste like raspberry. They are a little messy to eat if you touch them with your fingers because the red powder goes everywhere. There is a lot of extra red powder in each pouch. When I poured into my hand my hand was filled with red powder. These taste good and are not super sweet, they are not like candy. Rating 4 stars = Like It for a good tasting gluten free snack.
Rating:
4.0
Product:
Enjoy Life Chewy Bars, Soy free, Nut free, Gluten free, Dairy free, Non GMO, Caramel Apple, 6 Boxes (30 Bars)
Review:
This is a dry dense bar with no texture, it is like a compressed powder. The flavor is dense chocolate but there is a bit of a chalk taste.

The bars are tiny, at one ounce per bar. From the photo on the box you would assume that the two pieces shown were one bar that was broken in half hence the broken off end part that is shown -- but actually what you see there are two separate bars with some crumbs removed from one end which is really, really misleading. Look at the other reviews for photos of the actual size of the bar compared to the packaging.

The one ounce bar has 120 calories and 35 grams of fat.

They are gluten free, dairy free, nut free, and soy free. They are non-GMO. They contain xanthum gum and gum arabic in case you need that information.

I rate these 2 stars = I Don't Like It due to both the taste being not that great and the small size being not of good value. There are a lot of bars on the market and there are better ones out there.
Rating:
2.0
Product:
FISHER Snack Cashew Halves & Pieces, Stand-Up Bag, Gluten Free, 5 oz
Review:
The complicated thing about these salted whole cashews is they contain "soybean, cottonseed, peanut and/or sunflower oil". I liked the taste of these salted cashews, they were a just-right saltiness level for me. I am allergic to soy though, and I don't need extra oils added into the cashews. I stared to wonder if I was wrong in my thinking so I did some research online and found that indeed some cashews use a salt water brine with no oil, and homemade recipes call for olive oil with salt. I am rating 3 stars = It's Okay as I don't like the oil choices in this product due to highly allergenic soy, the peanut allergy issue for those assuming cashews would not contain peanuts. We usually buy raw cashews or organic salted cashews.
Rating:
3.0
Product:
SoFit Fruit and Protein Squeeze, Mango Orange, 4.2 Ounce (Pack of 8)
Review:
This is our family's  first use of a snack of this type. You unscrew the cap and consumed this fruit pure, it is not a liquid juice but has more of a consistency of baby food. This is made from pear juice , fruit pure of blueberry raspberry, strawberry, and apple. It contains way dairy for the protein and honey for sweetness. It contains 20 g of carbs, of which 17 g are sugars. There are 6 g of protein. It is 100 cal.  It is gluten-free and is non- GMO.

 It can be served at room temperature or chilled and it is shelf stable to be stored at room temperature. I felt the flavor was a strong fruit taste such as you may have tasted in a protein smoothie powder product or  fruit flavors of a workout  electrolyte  replacement drink.  It does not taste like fresh real fruit to me. I personally wouldn't choose to eat this but my teenage son who is an athlete who is on a high-protein diet  of six meals a day liked the flavor and enjoyed this type of new to us snack food.  This son of mine refuses to eat dried fruit as a snack so perhaps this type of food product is a way to get some fruits into someone as in on the go snack food.  It's hard to rate food products when one person like loves it in another doesn't I will say 4 stars = I like it.
Rating:
4.0
Product:
Nutiva Certified Organic, non-GMO, Vegan Hazelnut Spread with Cocoa, Chia and Flaxseed, Classic Chocolate, 13-ounce
Review:
This is a healthier alternative to Nutella and the consistency (spreadability) is better than Jason's as is the taste. Nutella was the first chocolate hazelnut spread I ever tried back when it was the only one on the market in USA. It was super sweet and made with corn syrup. I stopped eating it due to the unhealthiness of it and because to me it started to taste more like canned frosting. Jason's was the next I tried. Jason's is less sweet but needs a lot of stirring which is a challenge and it separates easily and can have some grit to it, it's not super smooth. Now I have tried Nutiva and it is amazing. The consistency is just like creamy peanut butter, no grit, smooth and spreadable. It has a deep chocolate taste and a good hazlenut flavor and it is not sickening sweet. This has 40% less sugar than Nutella.

Nutiva's ingredients that are notable are first, it's organic. Second, it contains sustainable non-problematic (no gorilla controversy) palm oil and coconut oil which help it have a smooth consistency. Mine arrived with no pooling or separation of oils. It also has chia oil which boosts the omega 3 count which Nutiva uses to promote this as a healthy food but let's not get carried away. This is what it is: a dessert like chocolate hazelnut treat, I am not looking to justify eating this treat by saying it's a health food. Nutiva is now my favorite chocolate hazelnut spread, it's a treat not a daily food for me. Highly recommended, 5 stars = I Love It.
Rating:
5.0
Product:
 Schr Gluten Free Chocolate Hazelnut Bars, 3-Count (6-Pack) 
Review:
Crisp thin wafers with hazelnut in between plus dipped in chocolate. Heaven! These taste fantastic and I cannot tell they are gluten-free, taste like a normal wafer cookie but more gourmet with the good chocolate flavor and the hazelnut that is not too sweet.

Expensive but not meant for eating in excess. They are a special treat. I rate them 5 stars = I Love It.
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Go Raw Organic Superfood Sprouted Cookie Crisps, Sweet Crunch (pack of 6 bags)
Review:
I love these "original" flavor super cookies. I had no idea what they would taste like: the taste is coconut.

This is a raw food product, dehydrated at under 105 degrees, this is considered a live food. The ingredients are coconut, sprouted sesame seeds, and dates (all organic).

Has no: GMOs, trans fats, or cholesterol.

These have a good flavor and a sweet taste, they don't taste un-sweet despite having no sugar or added fruit juices.

Oddly I find all the super cookie products by Go Raw to be filling and I actually often eat about 8 which is less than half a serving. The serving size is 18. They help satisfy my taste for something cookie like and something sweet, I am trying to eat grain free and to reduce sugar intake as I am pre-diabetic.
Rating:
5.0
Product:
 Schr Gluten Free Penne, 12 oz. Box, 5-Pack 
Review:
Took a chance on this as the quest for as close to normal pasta as possible while being gluten-free is a constant quest. This does not disappoint! It tastes completely normal and like white flour wheat flour. It has a dark color but it tastes like a white flour plain taste. Other GF pastas have a taste of nuttiness or something bitter but this is great.

One discrepancy, I bought this a couple of weeks ago and my package says cook 5-6 minutes only (the product description here today says double that time). After 6 minutes it was perfectly cooked, al dente just a bit and it also did not clump up in the pot, or while draining, or on the plate. It did not fall apart at all.

Ingredients are: buckwheat, sorghum flour, and chickory root flour listed at the back and the full disclosure also says: rice flour, corn flour, lentil flour, cane sugar syrup (last ingredient on the list). Made in Italy, Labeled gluten-free, wheat-free, lactose-free. If you have questions it says to call customer service at 201-355-8470 or email at info at schar dot com.

I rate this 5 stars = I Love It.
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Nutiva Organic, non-GMO, Premium Ground Chia Seeds
Review:
Today I used 3 tablespoons to make Chia pudding which means that I added it to coconut milk and then refrigerated it until it gelled. There was a loud crunch and there was a gray and black rock in it, which I threw away thinking it was a fluke. Then I found the second rock which you can see in the photo ( the first rock was twice the size).

 I chose to use this brand because it is non-GMO, certified organic, and certified gluten-free. I thought that meant this would be a quality product.  I called Nutiva today, and reached an American worker who just responded that I should return it to the store for a refund.  She asked where I got it from and I told her Amazon.com. I told her that I was upset that there were two rocks,  and then I think someone there would like to know that there's rocks mixed in with the Chia seed. Then she said, "Oh if you want you can send us an email with a photo with the lot number so that we can check it out." She was very nonchalant. I was shocked.

Nutiva is a brand I will be avoiding.
Rating:
1.0
Product:
Oatmeal Packets by thinkThin, Instant Protein & Fiber Hot Oatmeal for On The Go- 10g Protein, 5g Fiber, Vegan - Madagascar Vanilla with Almonds and Pecans, 1.76 oz Packets (6 Boxes/6 Packets Per Box)
Review:
This is a 10 grams of protein instant oatmeal. You can use boiled water or it is microwaveable. The dry contents look like a regular oatmeal but when it plumps up you can see it is more, better. It has whole oats, steel cut oats and quinoa as the fiber. It also has dried fruits that plump up. It has cane sugar to add sweetness but it's not overly sweet. The protein is soy. There are 190 calories. This is a better alternative than the overly processed oatmeal packets that have been sold for decades at the grocery store. This is for people who need more protein or want more protein to help with a weight loss program or for athletes trying to get more protein all day long. Rated 5 stars = Love It.
Rating:
5.0

golds.output: I've been using Colavita Capellini Nest (Angel Hair Pasta) for quite some time now, and I must say it's a great product. The pasta is very tasty and has a nice texture. I like that it comes in a pack of 10, which is very convenient for me since I use it frequently in my cooking. I've tried other brands of angel hair pasta before, but this one is definitely one of the better ones. The only reason I'm not giving it a 5-star rating is that it can be a bit pricey, but overall, it's a good value for the quality you get.

prompt.content: You are an Amazon customer that likes to write reviews for products. You will be provided a set of features to help you understand your writing style. First feature you will receive is similar product-review pairs from your past reviews to remind you of your style: Product: Bob's Red Mill Shredded Coconut (Unsweetened), 24-ounce (Pack of 4) Review: I get tired of having to go to a specialty store everytime I want unsweetened coconut, so buying a box of four of these was a reasonable way to add a fifth item to my subscribe and save order. This coconut is very tasty. Some brands of unsweetened coconut can taste dry and flavorless. I use this in candy making and add it to my morning yogurt and fruit. Rating: 4.0 Product: TWIX Caramel Minis Size Chocolate Cookie Bar Candy 11.5-Ounce Bag (Pack of 4) Review: The mini-Twix bars are delicious and fresh. Each one has a hefty layer of caramel over a cookie layer. It's then dipped in milk chocolate. Delicious! Rating: 5.0 Product: Peeled Snacks Organic Dried Fruit, Much-Ado-About-Mango, 1.4 Ounce (Pack of 10) Review: These are a delicious snack. I am allergic to the sulfur put on most dried fruit, so I appreciate these moist slices. Be aware that the absence of sulfur means that these dried apples are slightly brown. It doesn't affect their taste. I did find the core still attached to one of my slices, but I don't mind. I recommend these for those that like or need un-sulfured dried fruit. Rating: 5.0 Product: Wish-Bone Dressing & Seasoning Mix, Ranch, 2.1 Ounce (Pack of 12) Review: Ranch dressing is a favorite in our family. Making it from the mix gives us the original fresh Ranch dressing taste more economically. In fact I like the mix better than the ready-made bottled dressing which has extra ingredients that extend the shelf life. I also like many of the recipes that this mix can be used for, such as the seasoned potato chunks. Those recipes are available on the Hidden Valley Ranch Web site and are definitely worth checking out. Be aware that this product does contain MSG, for those that are sensitive to this ingredient. Rating: 5.0 Product: Wish-Bone Dressing & Seasoning Mix, House Italian, 2 Ounce Review: I tried this Italian dressing on a whim as I usually purchase Good Seasons Salad Dressing & Recipe Mix, Zesty Italian, .6-Ounce Packets (Pack of 24). This Wish Bone version of the same product dressing doesn't separate as quickly as the Good Seasons after mixing, which is a plus, but this Wish Bone Italian dressing has a much sweeter taste which I don't care for. If you like sweeter dressing, this would be a plus for you. Hence I am giving this product 5 stars, since my objection to it is completely a matter of personal taste. Rating: 5.0 Product: Hellmann's Dijonnaise, 10.75-Ounce Bottles (Pack of 12) Review: Hellmann's s is great mayo, but what I REALLY like about this is the cool bottle that dispenses your condiment with a squeeze and stores, lid down, so that mayo is always at the right end. Now if only the mustard packagers would get onboard with this kind of bottle/lid. This is ideal for picnics, but also handy in the home. Rating: 5.0 Product: SweetLeaf Sweet Drops Liquid Stevia Sweetener, SteviaClear, 4 Ounce (Pack of 2) Review: Forget the lastest green sweetner--buy your stevia in this form. I have been using this for years. Two bottles last and last making this by far the cheapest way to sweeten your food naturally. Highly recommended. Rating: 5.0 Product: Good Earth Herbal Tea, Sweet & Spicy, Caffeine Free, 18 Count Tea Bags (Pack of 6) (Packaging May Vary) Review: The product description for this tea on Amazon states: "All Good Earth teas contain absolutely no ... artificial flavors ...." What a joke. The third ingredient is "artificial flavor"! This product used to be naturally sweetened with Stevia leaf. It apparently has some kind of artificial sweetener now. What a disappointment. I will be cancelling my "Subscribe and Save" subscription for this product! Don't buy this product if you don't want to be drinking some unknown artificial ingredient. Rating: 1.0 Product: Lorissa's Kitchen Premium Pork Cuts, Sweet Chili, 2.25 Ounce (Pack of 4) Review: This Korean Barbeque flavored beef jerky is not your typical jerky. It is made from grass-fed beef and has a very unique spicy sweet flavor. My husband and I both liked it. I would buy this again if the price were right, but as a diabetic, the 6 grams of carbohydrates per less that 1 ounce serving is a bit high for me. So for my own personal consumption, I would choose a lower carb flavor. On the other hand, the fact that the meat is grass fed means that there is only 1 gram of fat per serving. Rating: 5.0 Product: Community Coffee Ground Coffee, French Roast, (Pack of 2) Review: I like this French Roast Coffee and consider Community Coffee to be a very good coffee that is on the economical side, as far as coffee prices go. I'm definitely a fan. However I've got a tell you that you haven't really tasted Community Coffee's French Roast until you drink it freshly ground from Community Coffee Whole Bean Coffee, French Roast, 12-Ounce Bags (Pack of 3) and brewed in a drip maker or French press pot. Now THAT is a real treat. So I recommend this coffee, if you are going to buy ground coffee; but if you like this, you'll LOVE the taste of buying it in whole bean form and brewing it from freshly ground beans. Rating: 4.0 Now you will receive features shedding light into how you use words and formulate sentences: -Most frequently used words of the writer is: ['coffee', 'like', 'product', 'taste', 'would', 'stevia', 'one', 'good', 'nbsp', 'community'] Finally, you will receive product-review pairs from other customers to help you distinguish your style from others. Product: El Avion Smoked Hot Paprika - Pimenton Picante Ahumado Review: This is an amazing hot Spanish smoked paprika. It imparts beautiful color and gives food a delightful, smoky, barbeque taste. We've had great luck using this to add a smoked bacon flavor to meatless dishes, but it's also great for making chicken and beef taste bacon wrapped. This one is spicy hot, but not hot like cayenne or crushed pepper, so If you enjoy spicy foods you will probably find this one delicious. Five Stars. Warmee and slightly toasted, they welcome a smear of butter. Great with your tea in the afteroon, but a good, quick breakfast, too. Recommended. Rating: 5.0 Product: Butternut Mountain Farm 100% Pure Organic Maple Sugar Candy From Vermont, All Natural, 1.5 oz Leaf Candy, 12 pack Review: Not the very best maple sugar, but a pretty presentation. I do a number of gift packages, and am always looking for something that brings smiles. Rating: 4.0 Product: FISHER Snack Praline Pecans Stand-Up, Resealable Bag, 5.5 oz Review: Tasty, but a little too hard. Pecans have a nice bite-feel, UNTIL they are coated with a sweet-salty mixture which hardens too much. Sell-by date? None that I could find. Recommendation: Try a smaller package and see how you like them. They ARE tasty. Rating: 3.0 Product: Annie's Organic Snack Mix, Assorted Crackers and Pretzels, 9 oz Box (Pack of 4) Review: They must not use those tricky chemicals that leave you wanting more, more, more. I find these hit the spot and don't scream "not enough!" Your results, of course, may vary. Go particularly well with "Big Bang Theory" re-runs. But my interest in those is beginning to wane. Clearly, further research is needed. Rating: 5.0 Product: Kitchens of India Variety Sampler - 5 Flavors Review: Very nice variety pack. If you are away from your microwave, or don't have one, you will welcome the fact that these pouches heat in three minutes in boiling water. I sampled the red kidney beans curry last night, over rice. The tomato and onion sauce was tasty. The beans were softened but firm, and not dry. Unlike some Indian imports, it just lists "spices" in the ingredients. Ginger and garlic are listed separately. Each pouch yields two and a half cups, a decent amount. Unless you are a hungry hiker! If you'd like it spicier, I recommend Sanskriti-Artisan-Pure-Natural-Spices. Rating: 5.0 Product: Campbell's Chunky New England Clam Chowder, 15.25 oz. Bowl (Pack of 8) Review: Chunks of potato in a thick soup. A bit bland; a dusting of celery powder or celery salt punches it up. Canned baby clams are sold separately here if you'd like to add more. Rating: 4.0 Product: Starbucks Classic Hot Cocoa, 30 Ounce Review: ...brightens my morning. Good cocoa, conveniently divided in two tins. I buy often. Rating: 4.0 Product: Kernel Season's Popcorn Seasoning, White Cheddar, 2.85 ounce (Pack of 6) Review: This is a household favorite. Funny thing, it doesn't taste much like cheddar, but, more interestingly, a bit like Parmesan. It can be sprinkled on brocholli (lightly cooked) and other items which need a bit of brightening. Mixed with toasted crumbs, it can top off anything from macaroni and cheese to lasagna. "Butter" seasoning is no longer in request here for popcorn. This is what is wanted. Rating: 5.0 Product: Trader Joe's Marinated Artichokes, 12 oz Jar (2 Pack) Review: I like these, warmed, as a side dish to an omelette. Good quality. Brighten the plate with some red peppers, crunchy or wilted in the pan. prompt.content:
You are an Amazon customer that likes to write reviews for products. You will be provided a set of features to help you understand your writing style.
First feature you will receive is similar product-review pairs from your past reviews to remind you of your style:
<similarpairs>
Product:
Bob's Red Mill Organic Whole Grain, Kamut Cereal, 24 Ounce Bags (Pack of 4)
Review:
I'd never heard of Kamut before it showed up in my Gold Box deals (since I had purchased some other Red Mill products), but decided to give it a try based on the positive reviews. I'm glad I did. As a hot breakfast cereal, it has a nutty flavor and a consistency similar to MaltoMeal, but is much better for you! The taste took a little getting used to (it's best with some milk and brown sugar) but I now like it quite a bit. I've added it to my breakfast mix, and alternate it with oatmeal. I've also started mixing in a tablespoon or two of flax seed from time to time. It also goes really well with fresh berries, or even frozen blueberries if you thaw them out first.

While not quite supplanting oatmeal as my hot cereal of choice, Kamut has proven to be well worth the purchase; tasty, healthy, and organic. What more can you ask for from a product purchased on a whim?

*****UPDATE 07/15/2010*****

I tried making the "Pharaohs Muffins" recipe on the back of the package and loved it! I added chopped dates, raisins, and ginger, as well as a pinch of cinnamon. I also omitted the butter and sugar, and instead used apple sauce. The muffins turned out extremely well, and I'll be making them again. My wife also loved them, as did the coworkers I shared them with. They were pretty surprised to find out they clock in at 145 calories and have virtually no fat! So give them a try--they are worth it.
Rating:
4.0
Product:
Gatorade Performance Series Nutrition Shake, Vanilla, 11-Ounce Cans (Pack of 6)
Review:
These Gatorade nutrition shakes are easily the best tasting energy/nutrition/protein shakes I've ever tasted. The consistency is nice and smooth with zero chalkiness, which most energy shakes are ruined by. This one is just perfect as far as flavor and consistency.

To other reviewers saying the shakes have too many calories and not enough protein: these are not intended specifically as protein shakes. That's why they're called "Nutrition" shakes. If you want a specific protein shake, there are many of them available. I look at these as a light meal replacement or as an after work out energy replacement.

An interesting note: The cans are made of steel not aluminum; they are much heavier and stronger than aluminum cans which means they can be stored in a gym back and not accidentally get burst open.
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Golden Valley Natural Buffalo Jerky, Original, 3-Ounce Pouch (Pack of 8)
Review:
I've always thought buffalo jerky is much better tasting that beef jerky, as well as being leaner, and hence better for you. This buffalo jerky doesn't disappoint in the flavor department. It is slightly sweet, and has a very nice texture. However, some of the portions were a little dry and hard for my taste. There are also the occasional pieces of fat that I found in one bag. That is the disadvantage of buying 8 bags at a time online; you can't visually inspect what you're getting and not select bags that contain too much fat. You can contact Golden Valley and they will replace any bag that has too much fat for your taste, but expect 2-3 weeks before they'll deliver the replacement bag. Still, better customer service than most companies!
Rating:
4.0
Product:
Rishi Tea Organic Black Tea, Earl Grey Loose Tea, 3.3-Ounce Tin (Pack of 3)
Review:
I've always enjoyed a good cup of Earl Grey (especially when coupled with a good book) but have not really gotten loose leaf before. This Rishi Earl Grey is very nice, not overly heavy with no licorice undertones that I really find unappealing in some Earl Gery varieties. The tea takes four minutes to steep, and when done is quite aromatic. I would recommend this one without reservation.

*****Update 10-10-2009*****

I had to come update this review to express how much I LOVE this tea. It's easily one of the most enjoyable teas I've experienced (I'm drinking a cup of it as I update this review) and it always makes me happy when I brew a cup. This is a lovely tea!
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Traditional Medicinals Organic Chamomile Herbal Leaf Tea, 16 Tea Bags (Pack of 6)
Review:
Traditional Medicinals makes some really nice tea, and their organic peppermint is one of the best. It is strong; none of that weak fare you get at your local grocery store. You can really taste the peppermint oil on your tongue, almost as if it were brewed from fresh peppermint. It is not sweet; add some honey or raw sugar if you like it that way. Excellent for your digestive track and memory, peppermint tea is a wonderful study aid and will help you stay focused without getting the jitters of caffeine.

A first class tea, and easy to recommend to anyone who enjoys herbals.
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Fruit Harvest Cereal, Strawberry Blueberry, 12.2-Ounce Boxes (Pack of 4)
Review:
This is one of my favorite breakfast cereals. I think what distinguishes it most is the quality of the freeze-dried fruit. When combined with milk, the fruit rehydrates quite well, tasting neither soggy nor chewy like so many others.

It might not be the healthiest cereal available, but it is low in sugar, tastes great, and beats eating Grape Nuts or granola every morning. If you want a real treat, mix in some fresh blueberries...
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Reeses Puffs, Peanut Butter, 22.9 Ounce (Pack of 3)
Review:
I'm at risk of obesity and cardiac failure because of this breakfast cereal. Not far down the ingredient list you can find "crack cocaine," which gives these puffs their signature taste and addictive quality. I eat these for breakfast. I eat them as a snack. I eat them for desert. I hoard them from the other members of my family. These are high-risk behaviors that have started to concern those who love me. But they are all wrong. I don't have a problem. I have tasty Reese's Puffs. This "Family Size" is really an "Individual Size." Because I am not sharing, not with you, not with anyone. I will shovel these tasty chocolate and peanut butter puffs down my gullet until I die a very happy man, likely not far in the distant future. So take your opinions and condemnation elsewhere, breakfast confection hater. Enjoy your flavorless wheat sticks and low fat yogurt in the dark comfort of your empty, soulless existence. I will chow down on my Reese's Puffs until I collapse face-first into my cereal bowl.
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Ka-Me Noodle Box, Pad Thai, 11.6 Ounce (Pack of 6)
Review:
Ka-Me makes a lot of different rice/noodle dishes, some of which are really quite good for prepared meals. This variety, however, is not their best. The noodles are ok, but the Szechuan flavoring is not to my taste. It's a bit generic and a little too salty. I much prefer their Red Curry rice meals which are very, very good.

Still worth getting to mix into the lunch rotation, but will never be a favorite of mine.
Rating:
3.0
Product:
Ghirardelli Chocolate Premium Hot Cocoa Mix, Chocolate Mocha, 16-Ounce Cans (Pack of 4)
Review:
Ghiradelli might not make the best chocolate in the world, but their chocolate mix is my personal favorite. It is rich and mixes easily without the residue in the bottom of the cup that lesser brands suffer from. The mocha flavor is very good with a strong coffee flavor that doesn't overpower the chocolate. This is simply great hot chocolate and well worth getting if you enjoy mocha. It also mixes very well in milk shakes!
Rating:
5.0
Product:
V8 Vegetable Juice, Low Sodium, 46-Fl Oz Bottles (Pack of 12)
Review:
Nutritionists recommend that you get a serving of vegetables with every meal, but how to accomplish that with a breakfast has always been a tough one for me since I don't like starchy vegetables like potatoes, and aside from cutting up a tomato, few other things go well with yogurt, egg whites, oatmeal, or any of the other stuff I like in the morning. A simple glass of V8 works perfectly. I've always loved V8 juice for that reason, but found it just a tad too salty. The low sodium version has made V8 perfect in my opinion. It has more flavor than most tomato juices, with a nice hint of celery seed. (It also makes a mean Bloody Mary!). Amazon's price for a 12 pack shipped free is very competitive, especially if you sign up for a subscription. Whether you get it from Amazon or somewhere else, it's just as good. Get yourself some. Your body will thank you!
Rating:
5.0
</similarpairs>

Product:
Gatorade Performance Series Carbohydrate Energy Formula, Orange, 12-Ounce Bottles (Pack of 24)
Review:
I ordered this product for my husband who trains for triathalons.  We normally buy the standard Gatorade mix from the grocery store, but were intrigued with the new carb-recovery drink.  So, he put it to the test.  For flavor, he states that this drink tastes pretty similar to the original orange, which is refreshing.  Those who like standard Gatorade may find this a little on the overly-sweet side, as it is higher in carbs and sweetness than the "original" drink.  For flavor alone, that was our only caution and the reason for withholding 1 star.  However, after one particularly difficult workout (a long, sweat-soaked round of shoveling after a PA snow storm) he thought that the flavor and sweetness were fine.
His personal recommendation was that this drink did a better job than the standard Gatorade of getting him back on his feet hydration-wise.  We have often found that after a grueling workout he battles dehydration for the rest of the day, which also leads to exhaustion.  In my years as a personal trainer, I have learned that the body maintains hydration best when it is accompied by a moderate dose of carbs because it helps the water stay in the body longer, thus making it more available to recovering muscles.  Generally speaking, he felt that his total recovery from the workout was significantly faster and better than with the standard sports drink, and the flavor is good if you're not taking anything else sweet at the same time.
Rating:
4.0
</Other Writer-1>

Product:
Milka Milk Chocolate with Chopped Hazelnuts, 3.52-Ounce Bars (Pack of 10)
Review:
Milka and its famous purple cow, recently purchased by Kraft, is an eastern European chocolate originally produced in Switzerland and is available in Germany, Austria, Hungary and other nearby countries. With hazelnut, the crunch and flavor has a pleasant exotic texture.

The hazelnut flavor is not subtle. For me, this is a good thing, and, as a result, I can devour two bars faster than I should.

Distribution is still weak in the United States, but can be found increasingly in larger cities. Usually, then, it is found only in international grocery stores, though it pops up in eclectic grocers from time to time. It has been around 100 years. Whether or not Kraft will change the recipe has yet to be seen. For now, the texture and taste are better than Hershey's and Nestle. It is a smoother, creamier basic chocolate, although they also make varieties which include yogurt, nuts and a version with Oreo Cookies. Buy a case of the hazelnut Milka and enjoy!

Anthony Trendl
editor, [...]

Product:
Kirkland Signature Minced California Garlic, 48 Ounce
Review:
I have always avoided packaged garlic, because, really how hard is it to smash and chop a couple of cloves of fresh garlic? However, after a visit with my daughter during which we made a variety of home-made pizzas, she demonstrated what an excellent pizza sauce it makes. She spreads it on the dough, with no other sauce, and tops it with prosciutto; then when it comes out of the oven sprinkle chopped arugula over the top - delicious and easy home made pizza.

There are many other uses for the Kirkland Chopped Garlic - toss it in a stew or soup, saut it with fresh spinach, put a dab in an omelette, add it to fresh home-made tomato sauce/pizza sauce. It works well in any cooked dishes; however for un-cooked dishes which require fresh garlic, I still do it the old fashioned way. The Kirkland Chopped Garlic is not as pungent and tasty as fresh garlic and doesn't have that unique, sharp aroma and bite.

Don't be put off by the large 48 oz. plastic jar. While it seems like a huge quantity, at least a third of the volume is water, and if you do a lot of home cooking, you will consume it before the "use by" date. Best of all, you will never be without garlic when you need it.
Rating:
4.0
</Other Writer-1>

Product:
Timothy's World Coffee, Morning Blend, K-Cup Portion Pack for Keurig K-Cup Brewers 24-Count  (Pack of 2)
Review:
We ordered Timothy's Midnight Magic and the Rainforest Espresso on subscription. The MM has been great, and the taste of the RE is very good (although we like the MM best). Our problem with it is, we must have gotten a bad batch. We've had four of the K cups so far expel just about the entire contents of the K cup in grounds, and we're not halfway through the batch.

We re-read the Keurig instructions to be sure we weren't doing something wrong, and we're not. This is apparently a defective batch. Now, I know based on previous Amazon experiences that Amazon would replace this in a heartbeat, no questions asked; but we've already drunk half the coffee and I just don't think it's fair to expect a full replacement when only a small percentage of the product is unacceptable. But at the per-cup price, even one defective K cup is a real drag--not to mention the trauma of downing those mud-thick grounds first thing in the morning when you're not anywhere near being awake yet!

Hopefully, Timothy's will do a little QA and find out what's going on with their production process that would allow this kind of thing to happen. Because we really do love their coffee.

4.0

Product:
Spicy World Turmeric Powder (Ground), 14 Ounce
Review:
This Spicy World Turmeric Powder is the BEST BUY that I have found. Since I have been using this spice in many foods, I love the taste of it and the fact that it gives my white sauces that GOLDEN YELLOW color, turns plain white rice into yellow (Saffron looking rice).
This particular spice not only tastes wonderful, it is so healthy to eat. I went to Google and typed in benefits of turmeric and was amazed at all of the benefits of this tasty herb! And so you will know---Turmeric is what gives MUSTARD it's yellow color and wonderful flavor!

If you love that special taste in foods that people ask you "What is in the dish, it tastes great?" then you may want to consider this.
For the price and the quality, this is the best one that I found online.

Storage - I placed the spice into a zip-lock back and sealed it tightly and then placed a rubber band on it. So I will remember what the bag has in it I place the cut out of the Spicy World label on top of the bag with scotch tape.

HINT: Be careful handing this spice with your fingers as it will stain your fingers a mustard yellow. Also if spilled onto your clothes it may stain. I wear an apron in my kitchen and scrub my hands after using this herb.

Highly recommend this!
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Frontier Five Spice Powder, 1.92-Ounce Bottle
Review:
For me, I regularly prepare Oriental dishes, mostly Refried Rice, Lo Mein, and Stir Fry dishes. Of course I try to duplicate that restaurant Oriental taste as much as possible. I watch many cooking shows on TV and on SEVERAL of the shows, chefs used Five Spice Powder Seasoning. Thus one has so many positive reviews, I decided to try it for myself.

The results for me is just amazing and I found my Oriental dishes have much better flavor as I am now using thus spice regularly. In addition to using it for Oriental dushes, I tried this in my spaghetti and even in my a Taco meat. Wow, these dishes had more flavor and much zestier!

However, what you need to know us that this Seasoning is very, very strong. When I cook with it, I just use a very tiny pinch of it. That way it is not overpowering in her dish.

The taste of is is sweet, sour, hot, yet comforting. In my opinion, it brings to my dushes the question What is that special flavor in this food? Since I add just a tiny amount of this seasoning, the food is a delight I have really received compliments.

One more thing: Thus spice is in a glass jar and closes up well to lock in the marvelous flavor.

Highly recommended.
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Nu-Salt Substitute Shaker, 3 Ounce
Review:
Personally, I love the taste of salt, and love to eat salty foods. Hence, I found myself eating too much salt and my fingers began to swell, especially the first thing in the morning. So I realized that I was eating and retaining too much salt! Then a couple of weeks ago, I was in my local market and noticed the Nu-Salt Salt Substitute and decided to give it a try. The taste I find is very pleasant and very similar to that of salt. Moreover, I noticed is now that I can sprinkle lots of this on my food and this satisfies my need for that salty taste, and my fingers no longer swell. And best of all, I lost 4 pounds due to water weight that came off!

**May I suggest that you DO NOT use this while you are cooking foods, instead, wait until the food is cooked and at the table then add this Salt Substitute. It goes much further and last longer this way.

This is a superb product and if you love the taste of salt like I do and you are on a restricted salt intake diet, this is the product to buy!
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Fiber One Chewy Bar, Oats and Peanut Butter, 1.4 Ounce, 5 Count, Pack of 12
Review:
For many years before I tried this Fiber One Oats & Peanut Butter Chewy Bar, I was Peanut Butter Candy Bar junkie! For that matter, anything with peanut butter in it was just want I wanted. However, I realized that I need more fiber. So decided to give these chewy bars a try and this is what I found:

1) They are sweet enough to make my sweet tooth happy.
2) They have plenty of peanuts and peanut flavor to suit me.
3) Love the chewy texture, it is more like eating a regular candy bar, but I do not feel the guilt.
4) These are a necessity for me as I keep one in my purse at all times to keep with me as I have low blood sugar and have to eat often. This keeps something in my stomach until I can eat a regular meal.
5) Fiber: At 4.5 grams, this is a nice serving. And it works well for me as I eat other foods with fiber during the day.

Great product!
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Hormel Compleats Swedish Meatballs, 9 Ounce (Pack of 6)
Review:
This is the best of the Hormel Compleats line of foods! Great tasting also! For me, a few weeks ago I picked up nearly every variety of the Hormel Compleats at my local store just to see which ones I prefer. This one the Beef Pot Roast is wonderful and my favorite of this line. For me, I add some garlic powder, a little black pepper and maybe seasoned salt to enhance it. Then I eat this with 2 slices of bread for a really nice lunch. Keep in mind this is FAST FOOD/Convenience food yet it still tastes good for that type of food. Does it taste like homemade? No, but more so than other brands I tried. For a quick lunch at work or at home and one that will save you time and money, consider this.

Recommended!
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Nissin Chicken Cup Noodles, 2.4 Ounce (Pack of 24)
Review:
Wonderful lunch and it fills me up - so tasty! This soup I picked up at my local market to try out as they were on sale for just 50 cents for one soup. Bought 5 of them and brought them home to try out! So this soup I highly recommend this soup for these reasons:

1) Noodles fit easily into a tablespoon or soup spoon!

2) Plenty of noodles in this soup.

3) Rich chicken flavor (no chicken pieces or veggies in this but still a wonderful flavor).

4) Filling! So for me, I added a few crushed crackers into this for added filling ability.

5) Makes a wonderful lunch and it takes just 3 minutes in a microwave to heat this up!

Highly recommend this!
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Quaker Oats Quick Oatmeal, 18-Ounce Packages (Pack of 6)
Review:
This oatmeal reminds me of the kind my mother and grandmother made for me when I was a child. This Quaker Oats Quick Oatmeal tastes so much better then the Instant kind! It still has that same taste and texture that I remember. What I do to make it even creamier is to add extra milk in place of the water. After it is cooked, I add just a little more milk and if they are available some fresh strawberries. For me this makes a wonderful and healthy breakfast all year round.

Highly recommend this!
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Pillsbury Angel Food Cake Mix, 16-Ounce Boxes (Pack of 12)
Review:
This Pillsbury Angel Food Cake is such a light and fluffy cake! My favorite cake of all! Recently I picked up several of these cake mixes in my local store. So I made a batch of these and added just a touch of green food coloring for green cupcakes for a Senior Center where I volunteer. There were no cupcakes left as everyone ate at least one cupcake and some had two! While I bring refreshments each time I visit (like cupcakes or brownies), they all told me that this was the best cupcakes they ever tasted. I agree as I ate one myself and it was so hard to eat just one!
Oh and one more thing: To keep it simple, instead of a frosting, I sprinkled a light coat of powdered sugar atop each cupcake and baked each cupcake in a paper liner.

Very highly recommend the Pillsbury Angel Food Cake Mix!
Rating:
5.0
Product:
ROTEL Original Diced Tomatoes and Green Chilies, 10 Ounce
Review:
Since I live this Rotel Original, I had to share with others how wonderful it is!  So I found mine at a local store and have found this slightly hot taste is perfect for:

1 Meat loaves - I use this instead of ketchup to add more zing to the meatloaf.

2 Homemade Enchilladas - I top off the Enchilladas before I bake them...what flavor and such juiciness and compliments.

3 I make Hot Cheese Dip and add one can of Rotel, and also use this dip over pasta, yum, yum.

If you like it hot but not too hot, the original is one to consider.

Highly recommend this.
Rating:
5.0
Product:
McCormick Onion Powder, 2.62 oz
Review:
For me, I have to have the taste of onion in most of my dishes. What I love about this product is that I use it for my cooking and also place it on my dinner table as a salt free seasoning. The taste of this onion powder wakes up foods and gives them that oniony taste that I love.
In years past, I tried the cheapie brands of onion powder but none taste as fresh as the McCormick brand does.

Highly recommend!

5.0

prompt.content: You are an Amazon customer that likes to write reviews for products. You will be provided a set of features to help you understand your writing style. First feature you will receive is similar product-review pairs from your past reviews to remind you of your style: Product: NESTLE COFFEE-MATE Coffee Creamer, Hazelnut, liquid creamer singles, Pack of 180 Review: They arrived safely and are just the same as you'll see wherever coffee is served. I was able to fit the box on a cupboard shelf after cutting a slot into it in order to dispense them. This isn't my favorite creamer, but I end up here at this home just every couple months for a week or two, and evaporated milk is really my only other choice for liquid instead of powder. So go ahead and make your purchase and you won't spend money on gas or do any driving, you'll just have 1 task taken care of that might last for months. Rating: 5.0 Product: Seattle's Best Level 3 Ground Blend Coffee, Medium Balanced, 12-Ounce (Pack of 2) Review: I order this two at a time so it's always there to include if I know I'll end up a hotel/motel. I do enjoy this because it's high in flavor and low in acid. Being finely ground I use less and it lasts longer and how could it be any more convenient than having it show up at my door along with my frequent Amazon orders. At $13 for a 2 pack this is a good price for a respectable coffee and I wouldn't hesitate at $17. I enjoy #4 also which is much stronger but #5 is a bit too bold for me. Rating: 5.0 Product: Eight O'Clock Ground Coffee, 100% Colombian Peaks, 11 Ounce (Pack of 6) Review: I just finished my bag of this coffee and won't be reordering more. These things are a preference to each drinker, and while I drank all of it up without issue, I didn't look forward to doing so as much as some others. I grind it a bit coarse because lately I've been using my Gevalia drip with a metal basket/filter. I do make it very strong using the 8 cup setting while grinding it for about 3 cups in my big mug. I typically add a dash of liquid Coffee Mate, and with this I wanted 3 dashes. It's not bad coffee, it just had a different taste that I didn't care for. In 35 years I've tried a lot of coffees and I can like Folgers Columbian to espresso, I prefer it dark roast and I'm not real fussy about coffee like some are. I won't tell you not to try it, because this blend may suit you fine, it just had a something about it's taste that didn't work for me. I'm sorry, but I don't even know how to describe it, but it wasn't as mellow as I'd hoped for. Call it good coffee that just wasn't for me. Rating: 3.0 Product: Planters Deluxe Whole Cashews Honey Roasted, 8.25 oz., 3 pack Review: I started ordering snacks through Amazon! The problem is that it's too darn easy and so I'm afraid I'll gain twenty pounds. So I can't recommend that anybody follow me on this path to weight gain and delicious, succulent, sweet honey roasted snacks that appear at your door like magic. I apologize for writing all of this down when I know the temptation of one click ordering combined with the crunchy, delectable, mouth watering thought of honey roasted cashews, that you can no doubt resist while out shopping, is like a tall glass of refreshment on a hot afternoon while getting a backrub and checking your winning lotto ticket. If you need help to break the lusting cycle just contact me. Horton at DrSeuss dot com Rating: 4.0 Product: Trader Joe's Black Pepper Peppercorns with Grinder -- 2-PACK, 1.8oz Review: I use a lot of pepper, and this arrived fresh tasting. Normally I'll have the 1 oz Mcormick bottles around here, but this is truly a much better price when getting two larger 1.8 oz bottles. Check on that though, because pricing does fluctuate here on the big river. These grinders do work well, but aren't adjustable and they give you a medium to medium coarse grind. I'm satisfied though and the size is larger but not too large, it's a better look also imitating all glass. Good purchase and recomended. Rating: 5.0 Product: Hershey's Nuggets Chocolates Assortment, 38.5 oz (Old) Review: I really like these, like to the point of actually using the L word. You do have to be careful of addiction however. So I ordered these up and all went smoothly for me, then I dumped out a pile of them so that I could find and eat three of the extra creamy almond toffee nuggets first, and then I put the bag away on a top cupboard shelf, out of sight,.....out of mind. Nope, it didn't work. Soon I was thinking about the milk chocolate, the milk chocolate with almonds and the dark chocolate with almonds too. How about you? What are you thinking about right now? I know! Yes they're fresh, yes the shipping was fine, uh huh, there's nothing wrong with the price that I paid, it's pretty close to a regular store price. Ahhh,....Go ahead, you know that you deserve it for something that you've done recently. Now go ahead click on it, it's only that color meaning caution, you're just one click from having this bag arrive at your door too, and then you'll feel all better. Rating: 5.0 Product: Equal Exchange Organic Whole Bean Coffee, Mind Body Soul, 12-Ounce Bag Review: I just finished my bag of this whole bean coffee and this is one of the best that I've ever tasted. I usually use a little creamer, but I had to try this one out black just because. Just because how the heck could I do a real review without doing it. Just like when I used a little creamer though, this coffee is so smooth that it's like the difference between drinking good bottled water instead of from the tap it's so smooth. It's pretty dark without the bitter taste that you can get from dark roast at times. Please don't think me crazy, but I use the recommended amount of coffee for 8 cups to make 17 ounces for my morning mug that goes in a 20 ounce mug, so that it's very full with an ounce and a half of creamer like Coffee Mate added, but I often use the cans of evaporated milk also. If the coffee isn't good when it's made strong like this, it can be brutal to drink. But the Love Buzz (I like the name too) the Love buzz isn't bitter and it's so free of acid that it seems impossible. I expect acid when I make it so strong and that's why I normally use a dash of creamer. My French press is at my other home where I'm not, so I've been using my Gevalia drip with the metal screen as a substitute. This works out pretty well and I've held off on picking up another press, because I've already been here longer than planned. I want to fly back with a bag of the Love Buzz just so that I can press it though because I want to try that so badly. So I've got more on the way because as of today, throughout my 35 years of drinking coffee this is my new favorite, just the best. Don't even think about if you maybe want to try it, it can't be everyone's favorite, but I don't think that you'll be disappointed. Rating: 5.0 Product: Nestle Carnation Instant Nonfat Dry Milk, 25.6-Ounce Review: I like this dry milk, because I rarely purchase fresh milk. When used correctly it can be substituted in recipes and depending, you probably won't know the difference from skim milk, whole milk is another story though. When mixing this up, first follow the directions and then I add more until it has too much taste from this, and then I just add a little water. I think that it amounts to about 10% more of the powder to taste it's best for me. The actual amount will vary depending on how much you're making, but for my use, I'll often start with 12 oz in my BlenderBottle. But even when custom blended and left to get cold and mixed again, this is not a good drink to me, and fresh skim milk will also cost less. The price here isn't really all that good, although it's too much when purchasing it in the local grocery stores also. I'll recommend this purchase for uses like mine, when you sometimes need a little milk and rarely have fresh in your refrigerator. Because if you too seldom have a carton of milk in your fridge, this is truly a welcome sight in your cupboard when you need just a little milk right now. Rating: 4.0 Product: Spice Jungle Five Peppercorn Mélange - 4 oz. Review: Great pepper combo, it turns your food into something like you've never tasted before, or umm, you know what I'm saying here, it's different. This isn't as spicy as black pepper to me, but that's alright, because it's having a party on my taste buds and I have a row of hot sauces. I feel like a more refined individual using this in my pepper grinder, and perhaps I am. (nose in the air) Recommended? Heck, just the smell of opening the bag was nearly worth the price of admission. Rating: 5.0 Product: Oreo Mega Stuf Chocolate Sandwich Cookies, 13.2 Ounce Review: MEGA Stuf is right. I admit that I have a sweet tooth at times and I thought that I'd give these a try while I was placing my order. I think that the regular Oreo is just lacking a little, and when I tried Double Stuf, I had to force myself to quit eating them. But I'd have to say that in my own opinion, MEGA Stuf proved the old adage wrong. You can get too much of a good thing. After the second one, I usually had no desire for a third. Maybe with a glass of water or milk, which I don't drink, but without a wash these are simply overwhelmingly frosting sweet for me. This did make the package last longer however. They arrived safely and promptly to begin my cookie and frosting testing though and obviously they will be to another persons taste, they just kicked it up a notch to high for me. But you have to buy to try and now I know, and if I didn't have to shop for my food online I would probably have just pick up the $1.88 house brand at a local store. But you can see what you think for yourself by including them in your own order. Rating: 3.0 Now you will receive features shedding light into how you use words and formulate sentences: -Most frequently used words of the writer is: ['like', 'good', 'much', 'hot', 'know', 'sauce', 'price', 'also', 'really', 'little'] Finally, you will receive product-review pairs from other customers to help you distinguish your style from others. Review:
Very handy, easy to make and always on hand for kids' visiting or ones who want some comfort food! Just pour the noodles into a microwave safe bowl, add 2/3 cup of water, heat for a few minutes, add the powder, stir, and you get what tastes exactly like the kind your Mom used to have to boil on the stove. Easy to make, tastes like the old fashioned version, and handy to have...they store well and are great for a nice and easy, nutritious snack for kids of any age. Packed in individual light plastic pouches, the noodles stay dry until needed, and the cheese pouches are in durable envelopes which keep the powder fresh and ready to use for quite a while, so the product can be stored until needed for weeks and perhaps longer. Sometimes, to reduce the salt in this product, I make two pouches of noodles and add only ONE of the powder packets...and a dash of sesame oil for a bit more flavor...They are handy to have around the house for kids, guests and instant dinners...

Gustaf's Dutch Licorice Coins, 5.2-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
Review:
I ate my way through a case of Gustaf's black licorice cats and thought I'd try the coins.  Unfortunately, they aren't as good to me.  They are quite salty, and not as much licorice flavor as the cats.

The package says "Firm with just a hint of salt."  It tastes like just a tad more than a hint of salt to me.  Prefer the cats.

Edited to add May 30, 2013:  I have now become addicted to these salty coins.  I completely choose them over the cats now.  It's an acquired taste, but once you acquire it - you're addicted!  LOVE THESE!  I'm ordering my second  case!
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Gustaf's Dutch Licorice Coins,  6 Plastic containers - 7-Ounce each
Review:
I ordered the lightly salted Dustaf's licorice coins, but received Traditional Dutch Licorice, without salt.  I really love the salted licorice and do not care for Traditional Dutch licorice, as it's bland, too sweet and unsalted.  The item was not eligible for a return, but I contacted customer service via instant chat.  They made it right.

This is just one reason why I love Amazon & will continue to shop here for most of my needs!
Rating:
3.0
Product:
Gustaf's Dutch Licorice Cats, 5.2-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
Review:
I'm a black licorice fiend, as is my mother. I had purchased her a case of these a few months and ago decided I needed to try them myself.

The first little cat hooked me!  These are firm little cats about the size of the tip of my little finger, but boy do they pack a punch of flavor!  I like the fact that they are firm.  Too soft is not good, in my opinion.  The flavor is pungent.

Each serving is 15 pieces, but this licorice is so satisfying, two pieces are good for me.  I like to drink some hot tea and have a few licorice cats as a special afternoon treat.  I'm impressed!
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Gustaf's Dutch Black Licorice 3-Flavor Variety: Two 5.2 oz Bags Each of Drops, Cats, and Coins in a BlackTie Box (6 Items Total)
Review:
We have been enjoying Gustaf licorice for years - especially love the salted variety.  This sample box gives us a chance to try several different types, however the coins will always be our favorite.
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Haribo Gummi Candy, Licorice Wheels, 5-Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)
Review:
Haribo licorice is the best black licorice I've ever tasted, and Amazon's price is the best!  Stock up!  I have!

November 4, 2011:  I am still buying this licorice, but it tastes like they may have changed the recipe a bit.  Still good, but something is not quite the same.
Rating:
5.0
Product:
HERSHEY'S 5 Pound Chocolate Candy Bar
Review:
My daughter received this as a gift.  Quite unique and impressive.  The candy bar shipped in a HUGE box that had ice packs in it.  The bar is so large, there's no way we can eat it all.

A great novelty item.  I plan on ordering some for gifts myself.
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Snack Factory Pretzel Crisps White Chocolate & Peppermint Flavor (Large 20 Oz Bag)
Review:
These are delicious.  I love Pretzel Crisps and enjoy all the flavors, but this special holiday white chocolate and peppermint was a must have for me.  I love peppermint, chocolate, and pretzels.

These pretzels are hard and substantial.  Adding the sweet white chocolate and peppermint is glorious.
Rating:
5.0
Product:
KIND Fruit & Nut Bar, Almond & Apricot, 1.4-Ounce Bars (Pack of 12)
Review:
As a person on the go, I cannot say enough of these bars!  I am always running and carrying a Kind bar with me is too easy.  I have tried several flavors and adore them all.  Chocked full of great-tastings nuts and fruit, these are extremely satisfying and well-worth what they cost over an average candy bar.  I eat them on on the way to work and on the way home.  Sometimes I put one in my sack lunch as well.  I can't think of anytime I wouldn't appreciate a KIND bar!  My husband loves them too!
Rating:
5.0
Product:
Haribo Gummi Candy, Pink Grapefruit, 5-Pound Bag
Review:
I always wanted to try Haribo Gummy Pink Grapefruit, but I waited for Amazon to have a sale, and it was worth the wait!  These gummy pink grapefruit slices are good sized, tart and tangy just like real grapefruit - and they smell good too!  You can't eat just one!

A 5-pound bag goes a long way.  I would highly recommend this product to anyone who can eat sugar and loves the tangy, tart taste of pink grapefruit.
Rating:
5.0
Product:
100 Calorie Packs Oreo Thin Crisps, 6-Count Packs, net weight 4.86 oz (Pack of 2)
Review:
I really like these.  They are so light and airy, almost like chips instead of cookies!  The flavor is that yummy OREO chocolate we all know and love!

5.0
